title: Handwritten Digit Classifier
summary: Built a Tkinter desktop app that lets users draw digits (0–9) and runs real-time inference with a pretrained CNN (MNIST) to display the predicted digit and confidence.

bullet_points.text: Developed an interactive Tkinter canvas app (brush/eraser/clear hotkeys) that captures drawings, preprocesses them (grayscale, invert, resize to 28×28), and performs real-time digit classification with a trained CNN, outputting prediction + confidence.
Implemented a modular training pipeline to load MNIST .ubyte files, train a Conv2D/MaxPool CNN, and export the model as a reusable .keras artifact for deployment in the UI.
